thread.title: 101 Places to Visit in Mumbai

title: 101 Places to Visit in Mumbai
text:
101 Places to Visit in Mumbai Yes, 101 Places to Visit! By Sharell Cook Updated December 11, 2016 . 
Wondering what to do in Mumbai? Here's a list of 101 places to visit -- yes, 101 places! No matter what your interest, you're sure to find something that appeals. If you want someone to guide you, going on a Mumbai walking tour is a great way to explore the city. Many of Mumbai's attractions are in Colaba and the Fort district. 
Are 101 places too many? If you want to focus on the most popular ones, take a look at these Top Mumbai Attractions . Visit them on one of these fascinating Mumbai Tours . Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus, Mumbai. Darren Robb/Getty Images 20 Places to Visit in Mumbai -- Architecture 
Mumbai architecture is an eclectic blend of Gothic, Victorian, Art Deco, Indo-Saracenic and contemporary architectural styles. Much of it remains from the colonial era of the British Raj .
